question: A Ramachandran, who recently passed away in Kerala, was associated with which profession?
explanation:
Renowned Scientist in the field of Fisheries and Ocean studies, Dr A Ramachandran passed away in Kerala, at the age of 61.
He was serving as the Vice Chancellor of Kerala University of Fisheries and Ocean Studies (KUFOS). He had also served as an expert member in several national and international fisheries organisations. He led the first ever International Blue Economy Congress in the country.
